author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: وَإِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الحَكِيمُ وَإِنَّكَ أَنْتَ العَلِيمُ، لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ المُعْطِ البَاذِلُ المُقْتَدِرُ الغَفَّارُ وَالحَمْدُ
translation: Thou art, verily, the God of glory, the God of power, the God of knowledge and wisdom. No God is there beside Thee, the Great Giver, the All-Bountiful, the Almighty, the Ever-Forgiving.
